repo.name: youbroketheinternet
repo.description:
Somebody broke the Internet. We'll have to make ourselves a GNU one.
This overlay is a collaborative maintained Gentoo developer overlay. Some of us are involved with secushare and GNUnet, but we try out all kinds of XKEYSCORE-resistant technology. Some of our unique ebuilds are the full GNUnet suite, and software around the psyced programmable communications server. Some ebuilds are experimental/testing - refer to the included README for more info and details. If you like to get involved, see https://wiki.gentoo.org/wiki/Overlay:Youbroketheinternet for details.
